document.full_text: kevin na set a pga tour record for the highest score on a par-four hole when he needed 16 shots to finish the ninth hole at the texas open on thursday.
document.title: na sets pga tour record with 16 strokes on par four
lines_and_colors: kevin na set a pga tour record for the highest score on a par-four hole when he needed 16 shots to finish the ninth hole at the texas open on thursday.
